product_name: AhavapRetinol Eye Cream for Smoothing & Fine Lines
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganThis lightweight Eye Cream is based on AHAVA's exclusive pRetinol patent which supplies the skin with Retinol precursors that the skin converts into Retinol. It is a 'natural-to-skin' safe alternative to Retinol, tailor-made for your skin with all of the benefits and none of the side effects.
details: DetailsBenefitsReduces the appearance of wrinkles and fine linesFirms the eye areaRestores hydrationFormulated WithoutAlcoholFragranceGMOsParabensItem 2606019How To UseApply on cleansed eye area day and night, smoothing from inner to outer corners until fully absorbed.IngredientsAqua (Mineral Spring Water), Isodecyl Isononanoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Caprylyl Methicone, C14-22 Alcohols, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Peg-40 Stearate, Stearyl Dimethicone, Propanediol (Corn Derived), Phenoxyethanol, Butylene Glycol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Peg-12 Dimethicone/Ppg-20 Crosspolymer, Mica, C12-20 Alkyl Glucoside, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Silica, Sclerotium Gum, Lysolecithin, Chlorphenesin, Xanthan Gum, Glucose, Glycolic Acid, Ethyl Lauroyl Arginate Hcl, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Corn Starch Modified, Silanetriol, Potassium Citrate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Citric Acid, Red 40 (Ci 16035), Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Tocopherol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glucosyl Hesperidin, Pullulan, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe-Vera) Leaf Juice, Fraxinus Excelsior (Ash Tree) Bark Extract, Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) Extract, Allantoin, Fructose, Niacinamide, Beta-Carotene, Dunaliella Salina (Dead Sea Alga) Extract, Maris Aqua (Dead Sea Water/Osmoter).
how_to_use: Apply on cleansed eye area day and night, smoothing from inner to outer corners until fully absorbed.
